Question & Options:
What roles do Ahmanet and Set play in the events surrounding Nick in *The Mummy*?
Options:
A. A) Ahmanet made a deal with Set for demonic powers.
B. B) Set takes over Nick's body.
C. C) Ahmanet tries to prevent Set from controlling Nick.
D. D) Nick successfully defeats Set without any assistance.
Correct Answer: A) Ahmanet made a deal with Set for demonic powers., B) Set takes over Nick's body., C) Ahmanet tries to prevent Set from controlling Nick.
